tool.name: Tool

param.name: undissolved_streets_network
param.dialogReference: Feature Class Input: Path to the streets feature class that is output from the Feature To Line.

param.name: network_dataset
param.dialogReference: Network Dataset Input: Path to the actual network dataset used for routing.

param.name: original_orders
param.dialogReference: Feature Class Input: Path to the feature class of the order locations. These represent the point features for collection/stop locations.

param.name: consolidated_orders
param.dialogReference: Feature Class Output: Path to an empty feature class with the Orders schema.

param.name: order_dependency_file
param.dialogReference: Output: Text path with filename.txt for the dependency of the consolidation to the full set of orders to be stored.

param.name: stops_location
param.dialogReference: Feature Class Output: Path to a Geodatabase with a feature class name such as orginal_stops to store the original orders with schema needed for expanding.

tool.summary: This toolbox takes the orders and consolidates them into a single order per street segment. This provides an efficient way in which to process data through the VRP Solver.
